page.title: 14TRANSPORT IN SANDBACH
page.content: {ATTITUDES}TOWARDS THE NEW ROAD VARY. MOST PEOPLE FEEL IT IS A LONG TIME OVERDUE.{ACCIDENTS}INVOLVING PEDESTRIANS, PARTICULARLY CHILDREN HAVE CAUSED A GREAT DEMAND FOR THE { {BY-PASS}TO BE BUILT. SOME PEOPLE FEEL THAT THE ROAD DOESN'T GO FAR ENOUGH AND SHOULD NOT JOIN CREWE ROAD UNTIL WELL OUTSIDE THE TOWN CENTRE. PEOPLE WHO LIVE CLOSE TO THE SITE HAD SOME RESERVATIONS. THE ROAD PASSES CLOSE TO THE CONGLETON ROAD ESTATE GIVING THE{RESIDENTS}GREAT FEAR FOR THEIR CHILDREN. RESIDENTS IN THE PALMER ROAD ESTATE ARE IRRITATED BY THE GENERAL INCONVENIENCE OF THE BUILDING. HAVING ONLY RECENTLY BEEN GIVEN A GOOD ROAD SURFACE THEY ARE PUT OUT BY THIS NEW DISRUPTION.HOWEVER, LOCAL GARAGE OWNER ON NEWCASTLE ROAD SHOULD BE PLEASED BY THE PROSPECT OF NEW CUSTOM.
